name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Champaign

reviews.text: Standard fairfield, in good shape, decent room, quiet, etc. No problems at all. Will stay again.
reviews.title: Met expectations

reviews.text: My family stayed here with my daughter's soccer team for a tournament. I had made a change to my reservation and it was erroneously cancelled completely. The manager on duty at the time I checked in was extremely apologetic and found me a suitable room at the hotel for no charge!
reviews.title: Nice Place, Great Staff

reviews.text: Other than that, they were very accomodating of our group's desire to host a Cinco de Mayo party in the breakfast lounge. For a small fee we rented this space, had use of the microwave, etc.
reviews.title: Ordinary, but great

reviews.text: The hotel has a small pool and workout area. The guest rooms were very quiet, and attractively furnished. Instead of a bedspread, the beds were triple sheeted and had a decorative "runner" draped near the bottom of each bed. There were five pillows on each bed, giving everyone something that would suit.
reviews.title: Room was alright, Breakfast was Great! Beware of the wireless internet worm.

description: This newly renovated Champaign IL hotel is right where you want to be. We are conveniently located off of I-74 between Neil St. and Prospect Ave. The Champaign Fairfield Inn & Suites hotel is moments away from the Marketplace Mall whose stores include: Macy's, Banana Republic, Ann Taylor Loft, Eddie Bauer, Bath & Body Works and many more.All of our guestrooms are smoke-free and include FREE wireless high speed internet access. The hotel features an indoor pool and hot tub and free deluxe continental breakfast.
